name: Bagasu
description:
Absorb the bullets with the same color character as the bullets to gain mana, then press e to fuse to kill the ghosts.

The goal is to survive as long as possible.

Resolution can be fixed by dragging the window

controls:

esc: Pause game

W: Up Player 1

A: Left Player 1

S: Down Player 1

D: Right Player 1

Up: Up Player 2

Left: Left Player 2

Down: Down Player 2

Right: Right Player 2

E: Fusion (When mana is full)

esc: Pause game

When in Fusion State:

W: Up

A: Left

S: Down

D: Right

Up: Dash/Slash up

Left: Dash/Slash left

Down: Dash/Slash down

Right: Dash/Slash right
